title: Foreign Emoluments Timeline: Trump-Saudi Arabia Business Relationships and Iran Strikes
description: Research the timeline of Trump's financial relationships with Saudi Arabia and how they may have influenced the Iran strikes decision. Focus on the $530 million in Saudi projects, Dar Global partnerships, and $600 billion Saudi investment framework.
research_areas: When were Trump's major Saudi business deals negotiated during 2025?
What specific dates connect Saudi financial arrangements to Iran strike decisions?
Who were the key Saudi officials involved in business negotiations?
How did Saudi Arabia benefit strategically from the Iran strikes timing?
actors: Saudi Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman
source_requirements: Saudi business contracts, Iran strike authorization documents, diplomatic communications, financial disclosure forms
pdf_source: Constitutional Crisis Assessment_ The Convergence of Foreign Emoluments, Federal Overreach, and Popular Resistance.pdf
